title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<moveToY Mia PedestalCheckpoint 0 60>>
<<moveToY Renata PedestalCheckpoint -30 60>>
<<moveToX Mia PedestalCheckpoint 30 60>>
<<moveToX Renata PedestalCheckpoint -20 60>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<faceUp Renata>>
[[preparetoclimb]]

title: preparetoclimb
body:
Renata: Ok, let's put this up there.
<<moveToY Renata Mia 0 40>>
<<moveToX Renata Mia -10 40>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.1>>
<<faceLeft Renata>>
<<moveToY Mia Renata -20 40>>
<<moveToX Mia Renata 0 40>>
<<moveUp Mia 1 10>>
[[climb]]

title: climb
body:
Mia: Up we go!
<<moveToForeground Mia>>
<<moveUp Mia 15 20>>
<<moveUp Mia 20 60>>
Renata: Ow!
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.5>>
<<showLayer fixedPedestal>>
<<hideLayer brokenpedestal>>
Mia: Woohoo!
[[open]]

title: open
body:
<<hideLayer door1>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<hideLayer door2>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<hideLayer door3>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<hideLayer door4>>
Renata: Wow!
<<disableCollider door>>
[[cleanup]]
